title: Bug 118780Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when select the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder and double-clicking on the first column name, the original name of the column is displayed below the expression builder. However, the alias name appears above as row['column1'].
EB: According to scr 78193, the first column in the expression builder should use the alias name instead of the original name when double-clicked.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the expression builder.
2. Select the dataset.
3. Double-click on the first column name.

Expected result: The alias name should be displayed above as row['column1'] after double-clicking on the original name.
